trans-unit.target: 为与键盘相关的事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the KeyboardEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: 中的没有现有键盘事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用 KeyboardEventArgs。

trans-unit.source: KeyboardEventArgs serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes, which are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardEventArgs 用作更具体的基类<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>事件数据类，所使用的现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>等事件</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs"></xref> class.
The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 与此事件关联的逻辑的键盘设备。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 将事件处理程序调用的特定类型的方式，这可以提高事件系统效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将强制转换的泛型处理程序，可为<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>并调用它。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此实现模式和它的原因的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由事件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 要以特定类型的方式调用的泛型处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要在调用处理程序的目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard device associated with the input event.
trans-unit.target: 获取与输入的事件相关联的键盘设备。

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的逻辑的键盘设备。
